title: GM, Softbank are $2 billion self-driving partners
text:
GM, Softbank are $2 billion self-driving partners 12:43am IST - 01:40
Japan’s SoftBank will invest $2.25 billion in General Motors Co’s autonomous vehicle unit Cruise, the companies said on Thursday, a deal that validates the venerable Detroit automaker’s head-start in self-driving cars.
